Package gameboard.tiles

Class FieldTile

java.lang.Object
gameboard.tiles.FieldTile
public class FieldTile
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the three fields, with its several properties and functionalities (i.e. to grow).
Author:
Luisaibele, Judith

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int growthState
    representing the state of growth of the first field
    private int growthState2
    representing the state of growth of the second field
    private int growthState3
    representing the state of growth of the third field
    private int harvest
    the amount of grain the player gets for harvesting a tile of a field depends on the level of difficulty
    private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> indexesField1
    HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values the indexes of the image view on the grid pane of the matchfield for field 1
    private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> indexesField2
    HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values the indexes of the image view on the grid pane of the matchfield for field 2
    private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> indexesField3
    HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values the indexes of the image view on the grid pane of the matchfield for field 3
    private boolean owningField1
    boolean that saves whether field 1 is owned by the player in the actual game or now
    private boolean owningField2
    boolean that saves whether field 2 is owned by the player in the actual game or now
    private boolean owningField3
    boolean that saves whether field 3 is owned by the player in the actual game or now
    private int sellingPrice
    the amount of money the player has to pay for buying a field
    (package private) java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Boolean> tilesField1Completed
    HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values booleans that tell if the specific tile of field 1 has already been processed by the player
    (package private) java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Boolean> tilesField2Completed
    HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values booleans that tell if the specific tile of field 2 has already been processed by the player
    (package private) java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Boolean> tilesField3Completed
    HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values booleans that tell if the specific tile of field 3 has already been processed by the player

    • indexesField1

      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> indexesField1
      HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values the indexes of the image view on the grid pane of the matchfield for field 1

      HashMap that has as key the indexes of the moving object (calculated: y*30 + x) and as values booleans that tell if the specific tile of field 1 has already been processed by the player

  • Constructor Details

    • FieldTile

      public FieldTile()
      Empty Constructor of FieldTile for reloading the game. It initializes the HashMaps immediately.

    • FieldTile

      public FieldTile​(int level)
      Constructor for starting a new game. The selling price to buy a field depends on the level of difficulty.
      Parameters:
      level - the level of difficulty the player has chosen

  • Method Details

    • initializeHashMaps

      private void initializeHashMaps()
      This method implements all the HashMaps, that are needed for cultivating, sowing and harvesting the fields.

      Getter for the state of growth of the first field
      Returns:
      the requested growthState of field 1

      informationBox - the InformationBox object of the actual game

      Parameters:

      informationBox - the informationBox object of the actual game

    • createHashMapField1

      private void createHashMapField1()
      This method creates the HashMap of field 1. As key, it has the index of the coordinates (y*30 + x) and as value the matching index of the image view on the grid pane.

    • createHashMapField2

      private void createHashMapField2()
      This method creates the HashMap of field 2. As key, it has the index of the coordinates (y*30 + x) and as value the matching index of the image view on the grid pane.

    • createHashMapField3

      private void createHashMapField3()
      This method creates the HashMap of field 3. As key, it has the index of the coordinates (y*30 + x) and as value the matching index of the image view on the grid pane.

    • cultivateField

      public void cultivateField​(Matchfield matchfield, int column, int row, int field, InformationBox informationBox)
      This method cultivates the fields. If a field is cultivated completely it sets the growth stage of the field to 1.
      Parameters:
      matchfield - the Matchfield object of the actual game
      column - x-value of the moving object to calculate the index
      row - y-value of the moving object to calculate the index.
      field - number of the field
      informationBox - the InformationBox object of the actual game

    • sowField

      public void sowField​(Matchfield matchfield, int column, int row, int field, InformationBox informationBox)
      This method sows the fields. If a field is sowed completely it sets the growth stage of the field to 2.
      Parameters:
      matchfield - the Matchfield object of the actual game
      column - x-value of the moving object to calculate the index
      row - y-value of the moving object to calculate the index.
      field - number of the field
      informationBox - the InformationBox object of the actual game

    • harvestField

      public void harvestField​(Matchfield matchfield, int column, int row, int field, InformationBox informationBox, Harvester harvester)
      This method harvests the fields. If the field is harvested completely it sets the growth stage of the field to 6.
      Parameters:
      matchfield - initialized matchfield from the class game
      column - x-value of the moving object to calculate the index
      row - y-value of the moving object to calculate the index.
      field - number of the field
      informationBox - the InformationBox object of the actual game
      harvester - the Harvester object of the actual game

    • proofCompleteField

      private boolean proofCompleteField​(int column, int row, int field)
      This method proofs, if a field is completely cultivated, sowed or harvested. It's called every time the tile of one field has been processed by the player. Therefore, it gets the index of the moving object handed over and sets the value of that index in the HashMap true. Afterwards it iterates through the complete HashMap to check if every tile of one field has been processed.
      Parameters:
      column - x-value of the moving object - is used to calculate the index of the moving object
      row - y-value of the moving object - is used to calculate the index of the moving object
      field - number of the field
      Returns:
      whether the field is completely cultivated, sowed or harvested or not

    • setTilesField1False

      private void setTilesField1False()
      This method puts all values of the HashMap to false.

      private void setTilesField2False()
      This method puts all values of the HashMap to false.
